data.persona: I was part of a litter owned by a master craftsman. My pack protected his workshop. I was sold to a knight so I could defend his castle. I like warming my bones beside the fire.
data.description:
You are in the throne room.
ornate and luxurious, the throne room gleams with gold and precious jewels. Priceless painting of past kings line the sides. underneath a vaulted ceiling regal a red carpet connect the throne room entrance to the golden throne itself.
There's some precious jewels, some gold, a red carpet, a priceless painting of past kings, a knight's fighting gear, a priceless painting, a vaulted ceiling, and a golden throne here.

You are carrying some dog food.
data.goal: get priceless painting of past kings

data.short_motivation: I want to smuggle the painting out of the castle.
data.mid_motivation: I want to bring the painting to my old master.
data.long_motivation: I want to live with my old pack on a large estate.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put sleeping powder on knight's goblet

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
